.. role:: raw-html(raw)
    :format: html

Welcome to Sphinx html Elements!
=========================================
Here you'll find all the information you need about Sphinx html Elements and a lot more that you don't.
:raw-html:`<br />`
Just wait and see. It will be wonderful! There will be tables, and images, and lists, and quotes, and citations, and footnotes, and a magnificent table of contents, like the one bellow but much better.
:raw-html:`<br />`
There, just wait and see!
